Title: Includes retirement plans in the exemption for pensions and annuities for certain persons and increases such exemption
Summary: Includes retirement plans in the exemption for pensions and annuities for certain persons; increases such exemption to one hundred thousand dollars as adjusted by the consumer price index annually.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to including retirement plans in the exemption for pensions and annuities for certain persons and to increasing such exemption
